properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sweet feast of love divine! ’Tis grace that makes us free To feed upon this bread and wine, In mem’ry, Lord, of Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Here every welcome guest Waits, Lord, from Thee to learn The secrets of Thy Father’s breast, And all Thy grace discern.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Here conscience ends its strife, And faith delights to prove The sweetness of the Bread of Life, The fulness of Thy love.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}That blood that flowed for sin In symbol here we see, And feel the blessed pledge within That we are loved of Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O if this glimpse of love Is so divinely sweet, What will it be, O Lord, above, Thy gladd’ning smile to meet!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To see Thee face to face, Thy perfect likeness wear, And all Thy ways of wondrous grace Through endless years declare.{/lang-eng}
